title: ITV Perspectives 2015 War Art 720p x264 AAC HDTV MVGroup.org
description:
War Art (ITV)

Arts Documentary hosted by Eddie Redmayne, published by ITV broadcasted as part of ITV Perspectives series in 2015 - English narration. 
http://docuwiki.net/images/0/05/War-Art-ITV-Cover.jpg

Information
------------------------------
Eddie Redmayne explores war art and how conflict's compelling stimulus to the imagination has created some of our richest and most powerful artistic inspiration. He takes an intensely emotional journey, visiting artists' studios, museums and travelling to battlefield locations to discover how artists have shone a powerful light into the abyss of warfare, leaving a unique legacy.
